00024 class VersionInfo {
00025     public:
00026         enum {
00027             c_flag_never_show_on_display = (1U << 0U),
00028             c_flag_hide_in_engineering_mode = (1U << 1U),
00029             c_flag_add_to_trace_info = (1U << 2U),
00030             c_flag_is_build_version = (1U << 3U)
00031         };
00032 
00033         struct Data {
00034             UINT m_flags;
00035             const CHAR* m_subsys_name;
00036             const CHAR* m_version_string;
00037             const CHAR* m_build_date;
00038         };
00039 
00040         VersionInfo(const Data* data);
00041 
00043         UINT GetFlags() const { return m_data->m_flags; }
00044 
00046         const CHAR* GetSubSystemName() const { return m_data->m_subsys_name; }
00047 
00049         const CHAR* GetVersionString() const { return m_data->m_version_string; }
00050 
00052         const CHAR* GetBuildDate() const { return m_data->m_build_date; }
00053 
00055         static const VersionInfo* GetFirst() { return m_first; }
00056 
00058         const VersionInfo* GetNext() const { return m_next; }
00059 
00060     private:
00061         const Data* m_data;
00062         VersionInfo* m_next;
00063 
00064         static VersionInfo* m_first;        
00065 };

00072 #define ApoxiDefVersionInfo(subsys, ver, flags) \
00073     static const VersionInfo::Data g_##subsys##_version_data = { (flags), #subsys, ver, __DATE__ " " __TIME__ }; \
00074     VersionInfo g_##subsys##_version_obj(&g_##subsys##_version_data) \
00075 
00076 
00080 #define ApoxiUseVersionInfo(subsys) \
00081     extern VersionInfo g_##subsys##_version_obj; \
00082     VersionInfo*  g_##subsys##_prt =& g_##subsys##_version_obj;
